TextBlock.Text: DAZ: Greetings, friends! This is the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop,</color> where we craft scrolls and projection stones for our clan to transcribe and transport information in compact forms.
DAZ: If you are here to inquire about the memory statues, kindly seek Phlox in the <color=orange>Statue Workshop</color> within the island in my absence.

DAZ: However, if you seek my expertise in crafting new projection stones (or wish to test out an exciting new type of projection stone)... Please seek me in my <color=orange>Workshop Loft</color> upstairs!
PHLOX: Daz, I was only responsible for sculpting the memory statues! You designed the memory storage systems - how terrible of you to direct such intricate queries to me!
AVENS: I have to wonder if the voyager stones would be completed by now, if only my brother could take less breaks to visit his lover...
